org.daisy.dotify.api.embosser

Interface Embosser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EmbosserFactoryProperties, EmbosserProperties, Factory, FactoryProperties

    public interface Embosser
extends Factory, EmbosserFactoryProperties, EmbosserProperties
    Provides an interface for common properties of an Embosser.
